articles.author: Chris Isidore,Juliana Liu
articles.title: Film and TV writers go on strike, bringing production on many shows to a halt - CNN
articles.description: More than 11,000 members of the Writers Guild of America (WGA) are set to go on strike Tuesday morning for the first time since 2007, a move that could bring an immediate halt to the production of many television shows and possibly delay the start of new seas…
